mapper.select:
select s_num, s_grade, s_ispoint, s_title, s_content, s_dstart, s_dend, s_dept, s_location, s_rstart, s_rend from tbl_schedule where
(s_grade like concat('%', #{m_grade}, '%') or s_grade = '1234') and (s_dept = '전체' or s_dept = #{m_dept}) order by s_dstart limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select *, (select count(m_id) from tbl_schedule_member where s_num = #{s_num}) as 'isjoin' from tbl_schedule where s_num = #{s_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_schedule_member WHERE s_num=#{s_num} and m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.select: SELECT sr_type FROM tbl_studyroom Group by sr_type
SELECT pg_type FROM tbl_playground Group by pg_type
